    • getDivisionListById

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Division> getDivisionListById(int countryId) throws SQLException
      can overload Division's constructor and remove requirement for countryId for this version of retrieving divisions
      Parameters:
      countryId - id used to query Divisions on the DB by
      Returns:
      ObservableList of divisions belonging to the country with this countryID
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the DataBase returns some kind of error
